title: ACG Research Announces New Principal Analyst for Intelligent Transport Network Practice
text:
October 08, 2015 at 07:00 AM EDT ACG Research Announces New Principal Analyst for Intelligent Transport Network Practice 
Telecom expert in global technology management, marketing and business development joins ACG Research DCI whether it's the packet or optical layer is transforming and becoming a high-priority area for many customers. — Ray Mota GILBERT, ARIZONA, USA, October 6, 2015 / EINPresswire.com / -- Timothy Doiron , a seasoned professional with 25 years of experience in the telecom industry has joined ACG Research, an analyst and consulting firm. ACG Research provides market share and forecast analysis in the service provider equipment space, business modeling and key performance indicators consulting services, service creation, strategic messaging and go-to-market strategies in all aspects of the networking industry. Timothy Doiron will expand ACG Research’s strong presence in the service provider space by bringing his extensive multi-disciplinary background and experience in software engineering, product management, business development and marketing. Mr. Doiron will be responsible for ACG’s Intelligent Transport Network division. He will provide detailed analyses for both infrastructure vendors and service providers in Packet Optical Transport solutions as well as emerging coverage on Data Center Interconnect (DCI), and Transport/Multi-Layer SDN (ML-SDN) segments. Most recently, Mr. Doiron was Vice President, Product Management for Coriant’s data line of business. His professional experience also includes working as a General Manager at Tellabs. Additionally, Doiron has held a variety of leadership positions in software engineering, product management, business development and marketing at ARRIS, Cadant, Ericsson and Southwestern Bell Mobile Systems. Doiron began his career working on fighter jets as an engineer in the avionics labs at McDonnell Douglas (now Boeing). Tim’s current focus is on the many innovations and transformations that are reshaping telecommunications and creating an agile, virtualized and software-enabled network. “It’s a very exciting time to be in our industry. We are in the early stages of some major shifts in how we deliver products, networks and services,” says Tim Doiron. “I am excited to join ACG Research and look forward to helping our customers succeed with high-quality data, analysis and insight.” “Tim’s diverse wireless, wireline and cable background brings a wealth of technical and business experience to ACG and our customers,” says Dr. Ray Mota. “We are excited to have Tim join our existing team of subject matter experts. DCI whether it's the packet or optical layer is transforming and becoming a high-priority area for many customers. Tim has the right background to not only help customers in the DCI market, but also address the broader architecture and sizing of Multi-Layer SDN.” For more information about ACG’s intelligent transport networking services or to schedule a briefing with Timothy Doiron, contact lleone@acgcc.com.
